6
Multilingual Representation Problem
Multilinguality Representation Problem
Inclusion of multilingual 
information in the 
ontology (rdfs:label 
and rdfs:comment 
properties) – Model 1
One conceptualization 
per culture and language 
involved, and mappings 
establishment among 
conceptualizations – 
Model 2
Association of external 
multilingual model to the 
ontology – Model 3
